function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Delay in full compliance leading to doubling of infections","Impact":"Significant increase in the number of infections","Mitigation":"Prompt and full compliance with mitigation measures","Technologies":"Contact tracing, testing, isolation, and physical distancing","People":"General public, healthcare workers, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Public health authorities, government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Ineffective contact tracing and isolation leading to uncontrolled spread","Impact":"Difficulty in controlling the spread of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Effective contact tracing and isolation measures","Technologies":"Contact tracing technology, testing infrastructure, healthcare facilities","People":"General public, contact tracers, healthcare workers","Owner":"Public health authorities, government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Premature removal of physical distancing measures leading to a secondary peak","Impact":"Resurgence of COVID-19 cases","Mitigation":"Gradual and informed removal of physical distancing measures","Technologies":"Data analysis tools, communication platforms, public health guidelines","People":"General public, businesses, local government","Owner":"Public health authorities, local government"}]}
